title: Translation of "Gripe" in English
description: Translations in context of "Gripe" in Spanish-English from Reverso Context: virus de la gripe, gripe porcina, gripe española, contra la gripe, vacuna contra la gripe
cleaned_text: Al probar este agente en muestras de sangre humana infectada con el virus de la Gripe A hallaron que se parecía acercarse a la proteína hemaglutinina. Testing this agent in human blood samples infected with influenza A virus, they found that it seemed to home in on the hemagglutinin protein. En el caso de la Gripe española han sobrevivido todos aquellos que se negaron a vacunarse. During the Spanish flu all those survived who any vaccination.
